Skills.title: REACT JS
Skills.text: With solid skills in web development, I stand out as an expert React programmer, creating innovative and functional digital experiences.

Skills.title: JAVASCRIPT
Skills.text: As a JavaScript programmer, I am focused on creating efficient and scalable web solutions to deliver exceptional user experiences.

Skills.title: CSS
Skills.text: Experienced developer proficient in JavaScript and CSS, dedicated to creating elegant and functional web solutions for a visually appealing and user-friendly experience.

Skills.title: HTML
Skills.text: As a developer with a focus on HTML, I specialize in building solid foundations for web applications, ensuring a semantic and accessible structure for an effective user experience.

Skills.title: TYPESCRIPT
Skills.text: As an experienced TypeScript developer, I build robust applications with more secure and maintainable code, raising the quality and reliability of web development.

Skills.title: BOOTSTRAP
Skills.text: I leverage my specialized Bootstrap skills to translate concepts into sophisticated and responsive interfaces, delivering contemporary and visually captivating web experiences.

Skills.title: VUE.JS
Skills.text: Skilled in Vue.js, I transform ideas into dynamic and efficient web applications, offering interactive and fluid experiences for users.

Skills.title: TAILWIND
Skills.text: Capacity in Tailwind CSS, stylized and efficient web designs, taking advantage of the versatility of Tailwind to create attractive and functional visual experiences.

Skills.title: GIT AND GITHUB
Skills.text: As a professional with experience in Git and GitHub, I manage version control and collaboration on projects, ensuring workflow and source code.

Skills.title: POSTMAN
Skills.text: Expert in Postman for API testing, I improve software quality by guaranteeing exhaustive validation of APIs, ensuring the reliability and efficiency of applications.

Skills.title: DEVOPS
Skills.text: DevOps professional specializing in CI/CD, automating and optimizing development workflows for efficient software deliveries.
